pullrequest.title: Use RelWithDebInfo mode for compiling as default

content.raw: As we discussed this morning: @_jrivero_ will confirm that there's no significant change in performance by measuring real-time factor in drcsim worlds, with the simulation under load (e.g., with a bunch of ROS subscribers running).  If that looks good, then we'll merge this change.
content.html: As we discussed this morning: @jrivero will confirm that there's no significant change in performance by measuring real-time factor in drcsim worlds, with the simulation under load (e.g., with a bunch of ROS subscribers running). If that looks good, then we'll merge this change.
